data.title: 科技正被用来传播反犹太主义。这也是解决方案的一部分
data.author: Scroll
data.snippet: On public TikTok, 17% of the content related to the Holocaust either denies or distorts it. The same is true of almost 1 in 5 Holocaust-related Twitter posts.
data.html:
Technology is being used to spread antisemitism. It can be part of the solution too

Virtual Reality Scroll

5h

On public TikTok, 17% of the content related to the Holocaust either denies or distorts it. The same is true of almost 1 in 5 Holocaust-related Twitter posts. 原文链接
data.text: 科技正被用来传播反犹太主义。这也可能是解决方案的一部分，在公共tiktok上，17%的与大屠杀相关的内容要么否认要么歪曲大屠杀。几乎每5条与大屠杀有关的推特帖子中就有1条是如此。，虚拟现实

event.事件: 科技正被用来传播反犹太主义。这也是解决方案的一部分
